events.message: I received my order last week, but the item is not what I expected. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The support system has classified the customer's report as a refund request based on the message content.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund inquiry for this customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
In order to process your refund quickly, may I have details about the product and reason for return?
The order number is 7845632. The product does not match the description, so I prefer to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate your refund once you ship the item back. I will send you the return label via email today.
Thanks for your quick response and for providing the return label; this helps a lot.
We have received your returned item and processed the refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the refund and see if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thanks again for your help and smooth process.
The refund case has been closed following confirmation of refund receipt and customer's satisfaction.
